evidence.claim: Chamco Digital utilizes cloud services, focusing on secure data handling compliant with health regulations.
The company emphasizes on integration patterns that comply with HIPAA regulations for health data.
Their projects incorporate EHR integration indicating usage of FHIR standards in health technology.
Chamco Digital's solutions are built on scalable cloud infrastructure to handle health data responsibly.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of focus on X12 transactions or API automation for healthcare data exchange.
